SEARCH
Package main.services

Class ApplicantService

java.lang.Object
main.services.ApplicantService
public class ApplicantService extends Object
Service class to handle applicant-related operations such as applying for a project, viewing applications, withdrawing, and listing available projects.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ApplicantService(FileManager fileManager)
    Constructs an ApplicantService instance and loads applications from file.

  • Method Details

    • apply

      public boolean apply(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, String flatType, FileManager fileManager)
      Applies for a BTO project if applicant meets all requirements.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the user applying
      project - the BTO project to apply for
      flatType - the type of flat being applied for
      fileManager - utility for saving application
      Returns:
      true if application is submitted, false otherwise

    • hasApplied

      public boolean hasApplied(Applicant applicant)
      Checks whether the applicant has an active application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant to check
      Returns:
      true if an active application exists, false otherwise

    • getAllApplication

      public List<Application> getAllApplication()
      Returns the list of all applications in the system.
      Returns:
      list of applications

    • getApplication

      public Application getApplication(String nric)
      Retrieves the most recent application for a given NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - the NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      the latest Application object, or null if not found

    • viewAppliedProject

      public BTOProject viewAppliedProject(Applicant applicant, List<BTOProject> allProjects)
      Displays project details and status for the current applicant’s application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the user whose application to view
      allProjects - list of all available projects
      Returns:
      the BTOProject the applicant applied for, or null if not found

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal(Applicant applicant)
      Requests a withdrawal for an applicant's application.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the user requesting to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal request is successful

    • viewAvailableProjects

      public List<BTOProject> viewAvailableProjects(Applicant applicant, List<BTOProject> allProjects)
      Lists projects that are currently visible and open to the applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant viewing available projects
      allProjects - all BTO projects in the system
      Returns:
      list of projects the applicant is eligible to apply for
